co.cask.tigon.logging
Interface LogReader

All Known Implementing Classes:
LogFileReader
public interface LogReader

Represents classes that can read log.

Method Summary
 void configure(LogConfiguration config)
          Configures this reader.
 List<String> tail(int sizeToRead, long writePos)
          retrieves the tail of the log, up to size bytes, line by line.
 

Method Detail

configure

void configure(LogConfiguration config)
               throws IOException
Configures this reader.

Parameters:
config - specifies what log to read
Throws:
IOException

tail

List<String> tail(int sizeToRead,
                  long writePos)
                  throws IOException
retrieves the tail of the log, up to size bytes, line by line.

Parameters:
sizeToRead - limits the number of bytes to read
writePos - position of the current writer. This is a hint to the reader as to how far it can seek into the latest log. This is necessary because we are reading into the latest file while it is still open for write, and hence the file system status will not give us a precise file length.
Throws:
IOException
